Summary: Observed invisible crafts cut paths through cloud. Noiseless.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There were no other sightings in Riverside on or around July 12th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was loading items into my car web I looked up and saw a formation in a cloud I've never seen before. Like a straight path was cut through the cloud without explanation. (See picture 1). The only plain in the area was not angled properly to have came from.that path. Then to my amazement as I watched a second, parallel path began to form through the cloud next to the first cutting from east to west towards me. Again no explanation for what was unfolding. See pic 2 for beginning of second "plowed path" through clouds. Pic three shows the completely cleared path still with no planes anywhere near formation of second path.
